title: Concoin (CONX) Hits 24-Hour Volume of $0.00
content: Concoin (CURRENCY:CONX) traded flat against the US dollar during the 24-hour period ending at 17:00 PM E.T. on June 2nd. During the last seven days, Concoin has traded down 29.7% against the US dollar. One Concoin coin can now be purchased for $0.0085 or 0.00000112 BTC on popular cryptocurrency exchanges. Concoin has a market capitalization of $6,308.00 and approximately $0.00 worth of Concoin was traded on exchanges in the last 24 hours.    Here is how similar cryptocurrencies have performed during the last 24 hours:   Ripple (XRP) traded 4.4% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $0.64 or 0.00008417 BTC.  Stellar (XLM) traded up 3.9% against the dollar and now trades at $0.30 or 0.00003901 BTC.  IOTA (MIOTA) traded up 1% against the dollar and now trades at $1.88 or 0.00024687 BTC.  TRON (TRX) traded 5.5% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $0.0609 or 0.00000799 BTC.  NEO (NEO) traded up 3.9% against the dollar and now trades at $56.55 or 0.00741909 BTC.  Tether (USDT) traded down 0.9% against the dollar and now trades at $0.99 or 0.00012998 BTC.  VeChain (VEN) traded up 10% against the dollar and now trades at $3.72 or 0.00048808 BTC.  Binance Coin (BNB) traded 4.8% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $14.68 or 0.00192586 BTC.  Ontology (ONT) traded up 9.2% against the dollar and now trades at $7.67 or 0.00100615 BTC.  Zilliqa (ZIL) traded 7.2% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $0.12 or 0.00001546 BTC.   Concoin Coin Profile    Concoin’s total supply is 1,595,266 coins and its circulating supply is 744,266 coins. Concoin’s official Twitter account is @con_coin . Concoin’s official website is www.concoin.com .  Concoin Coin Trading    Concoin can be bought or sold on the following cryptocurrency exchanges: YoBit.  It is usually not currently possible to buy alternative cryptocurrencies such as Concoin directly using U.S. dollars. Investors seeking to acquire Concoin should first buy Ethereum or Bitcoin using an exchange that deals in U.S. dollars such as Gemini, Coinbase or Changelly. Investors can then use their newly-acquired Ethereum or Bitcoin to buy Concoin using one of the aforementioned exchanges.
